ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Each H ⟷ H eclipsing interaction in ethane costs about 4.0 kJ/mol. How many such interactions are present in cyclopropane? What fraction of the overall 115 kJ/mol (27.5 kcal/mol) strain energy of cyclopropane is due to torsional strain?
